price: እናንተ በልቦቻቸው ውስጥ በማስፈራት ከአላህ ይልቅ የበረታችሁ ናችሁ፡፡ ይህ እነርሱ የማያውቁ ሕዝቦች በመኾናቸው ነው፡፡
arabic: لَأَنتُمۡ أَشَدُّ رَهۡبَةٗ فِي صُدُورِهِم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِۚ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ قَوۡمٞ لَّا يَفۡقَهُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: la-antum ashaddu rahbatan fī ṣudūrihim mina al-lahi dhālika bi-annahum qawmun lā yafqahūna
